titleStmt.title: A treatise of auricular confession. Wherin [sic] is euidently shewen, the authoritie and power of Catholique priests, for the forgiuing and remitting of sinnes. : Against the Protestants bare and only preaching of absolution vnto the people.
titleStmt.author: Heigham, John, fl. 1639, printer.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Heigham, with permission of Superiors.,

notesStmt.note: Title vignette; headpiece; initials; t.p. and text within ruled border.
"STC enters this work under its publisher, John Heigham. We have not found any evidence to support this attribution."--Allison & Rogers. Engl. Counter-Reformation, v. 2, no. 930.
Imperfect: creased and tightly bound, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: University of Texas at Austin. Library.
